title: Ticket #1233: batch_test.pl shouldn't rely on /bin/sh redirection.
description:
batch_test.pl starts tests with a line something like this: 
system("perl $test_program > $workdir/$test_program.out 2>&1")

Problems:

  • Assumes bourne shell-like shell (Probably not true under Windows, unless Perl is engaging in magic. While is possible.)
  • Run into problems if $test_program ever includes "special" characters like whitespace, > or similar.

Ideal solution: have perl itself capture the child's error and output, allowing the start command to be system('perl', $test_program), which solves both problems above.
